content: {"name": "Smile Organization", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- They require registration and an appointment needs to be set beforehand. Due to the large number of calls received a day you might have to call more tha once to get connected. If you are not an English speaker you might need to have a translator present as they do not have one of their own. Please be patient as they receive a vast number of calls.\n- Food distribution days will be scheduled after the registration process per individual.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.smileforcharity.org/contact-us/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "39 Hoover Ave", "address_2": null, "city": "Passaic", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07055", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.86286, "longitude": -74.125406}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 440-9360", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers available (must bring birth certificate)"}]}
